Title: Ghost Is Dead
Writer: Courtney Kemp Agboh (created by), Courtney Kemp Agboh, Safia Dirie, Vladimir Cvetko (story editor), Safia Dirie (staff writer)
Actors: Omari Hardwick, Lela Loren, Naturi Naughton, Joseph Sikora
Plot: Bodies from Ghost's organization drop left and right, each death inching closer to Ghost and Tommy.
